title: Gale-Force Advantage
story: The storm outside muffles the castle's creaks and groans, offering a stealthy advantage. Yet, the same gale batters the ancient stone, making swift movement difficult.
effect: During this Day phase, all heroes gain +1 to their D6 combat rolls when attacking any Vampire. However, each hero's maximum movement is reduced by 1 step (to a maximum of 3 steps) per turn.
